class datapipes.run.RunStrategy¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Base class for the cmd runner. All runner class implementations must implement this interface.

abstract execute(self, cfg: List[Dict[str, Any]])¶

Execute the Runner which starts the application.

class datapipes.run.RunLocal(cfg: Dict[str, Any])¶

Bases: datapipes.run.RunStrategy

Run Local has to be abstrated for anyone looking to execute a pipeline. This means projet specific logic and variables, if necessary, must be passed in.

execute(self)¶

Execute the Runner which starts the application.

class datapipes.run.RunGCP¶

Bases: datapipes.run.RunStrategy

Base class for the cmd runner. All runner class implementations must implement this interface.

class datapipes.run.RunContext(cfg: Dict = None)¶

Bases: datapipes.run.RunStrategy

Goal is to choose the run strategy and execute. Strategies include: 1. Local + #Companies 2. Local + #Companies + MiniKube 3. Local + #Companies + Testing 4. Local + #Companies + MiniKube + Testing 5-8. Remote + et al
